TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. you cannot go to space or become a pilot due to the G-forces involved, all of which are over 3Gs.

I wish for more puns.

Granted, but lame comedians steal 'em from you.

I wish for a Marshmallow Bazooka.

Granted, but a marshmallow jam causes you to turn into a marshmallow!

I wish.... 0.22 would come out with 0 bugs and glitches!

Granted, but the bugs return in .23.

I wish for a Anti-Human Mk17 device! (I want a earlier release! I'm not waitin' 17 days!)

you get one, but due to rushing the barrel was put on backwards.

you know wat happens from there :3

I wish i could fly.

Granted. you can fly for one entire glorious second, only when jumping from an airplane with no parachute.

I wish for a genie.

the genie appears. he will make 3 wishes and corrupt them. make a wish!

i wish that i could turn into a ice nexus!

Granted, but the fire part of the nexus gets jealous and melts the ice part.

I wish for a Mass Relay thruster. (How to Space by Danny)

Granted,

you get one, actully you get two. facing each other. o snap.

Granted, but your wish was a spy, so it went invisible and gone.

I wish for a YELLOW CAR!

Granted. you get a car that is both yellow and red!

cuz it's on fire

I wish i could be invisible in mirrors so i can finally see a never-ending mirror tunnel.

Granted, but oh no! (Actually yes heheheheh.) Temporal Mirror Paradox! How sad, looks like that mankind is a goner.

I wish for a infinite ice cream machine.

Granted but due to a confetti explosion, there is confetti in your ice cream. and the machine can't be turned off...

Good thing i'm not part of mankind...

I wish my xenon9 probe would work...

Granted, it works so well that the game thinks it's hax, so it crashes and deletes itself. No KSP for you son.

I wish for mankind take down hubble, it's stalkin' everyone, can't we have privacy?

Granted, they instead launch 1,000,000 SEEING EYES, which use gyroscopes to enter people's houses and invade even more privacy with x-rays n' heat sensors!

i wish for pie

Granted, it's a pie flavored pie that tastes like a pie because it's pie flavor.

I wish to the Wolvens (a race that lives in our moon) stop whining 'bout we stalkin' mankind 'n such.

Uh... DENIED (dun dun duunnnn)

I WISH MY WISHES WOULD STOP HIDING LIKE A NINJA!

(where did dat wish go?)

Edited September 30, 2013 by Firenexus13

Granted, but now they are spies!

I wish for a CELLO YAR!

Your CELLOW YAR turns to a YELLOW CAR. and lights on fire.

I WISH FOR LESS OBVIOUS WISHES

Granted, but they now become impossible to decypher.

I wish for someone to post in this topic

Granted. The post is invisible and deleted

I wish for someone to play Civ V with me

Granted, but they are an AI.

I wish for $600

Granted. But Congress refuses to solve the shutdown issue, the debt ceiling is passed, and the US Dollar collapses. Have fun.

I wish for a wish.

Granted. But Congress refuses to solve the shutdown issue, the debt ceiling is passed, and the US Dollar collapses. Have fun.

I wish for a wish.

Granted, but the wish is corrupted.

I wish for a not wish.

Granted, though you are given one anyway.

I wish for a Wunderwaffe DG-2.
